titleStmt.title: A discourse whether a noble man by birth or a gentleman by desert is greater in nobilitie
Nennio. English
titleStmt.author: Nenna, Giovanni Battista.
Jones, William, Sir, 1566-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Short, and are to be solde [by J. Flasket] in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the blacke Beare,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Sir William Jones, of: Nenna, Giovanni Battista. Il Nennio.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard at the signe of the blacke Beare
